channel.title: Jenspeedy on Leif Madsen.
channel.description: Recent content in Jenspeedy on Leif Madsen.

item.title: Long-term 'shopping list' helps couple furnish Caledon townhouse
item.description: Recently, @jenspeedy of http://www.yourhome.ca interviewed my fiancée and I about our recently purchased townhouse in Caledon after our designer @melissadavis of http://www.melissadavis.ca and http://www.designerfriend.ca recommended she speak to us. Danielle (my fiancée) and I had a pretty good idea about the items we wanted for our new townhouse build, but were looking for a designer to make sure we didn’t get too far off track, and to steer us into the direction we ultimately wanted to achieve, while not breaking the bank (i.
